explanation: The problem was that the condition used S[i] % 25 by itself. While this works in many cases because 0 is falsy and non-zero is truthy, it's unclear and can lead to subtle mistakes. The correct and explicit check is to test whether the remainder is non-zero (i.e. S[i] % 25 != 0) to detect values not divisible by 25. I changed only the single line in the for-loop to use 'S[i] % 25 != 0'.
